[LeetCode] Search Insert Position

Sep 23, 2014
1 minute read

Search Insert Position

不用考虑，直接二分搜索，时间复杂度O(logn)。代码如下：

 1 class Solution {
 2 public:
 3     int searchInsert(int A[], int n, int target) {
 4         int low = 0, high = n - 1;
 5 
 6         while (low <= high)
 7         {
 8             int mid = (high + low) / 2;
 9             if (A[mid] == target)
10                 return mid;
11             else if (A[mid] > target)
12                 high = mid - 1;
13             else
14                 low = mid + 1;
15         }
16         return low;
17     }
18 };
array binary search LeetCode
